item.title: ä½¿ç”¨Dockerè¿è¡ŒConsul
item.description: å•èŠ‚ç‚¹ å¼€å‘æ¨¡å¼ mkdir -p /data/consul-data mkdir -p /data/consul-conf docker run -d -p 8500:8500 -p 8600:8600/udp -v /data/consul-data:/consul/data -v /data/consul-conf:/consul/config --name=consul_server consul agent -dev -ui -node=consul-server -bootstrap-expect=1 -client=0.0.0.0 -data-dir /consul/data -config-dir /consul/config

item.title: ä½¿ç”¨Dockerè¿è¡ŒRedis

item.title: ä½¿ç”¨Dockerè¿è¡ŒMongoDB
item.description: Use Docker-Compose version: '3.1' services: mongo: image: mongo restart: always environment: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: root MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: example volumes: - db_store:/data/db ports: - 27017:27017 volumes: db_store: {}
